name: Xojo XML Project File
summary: Learn about .XOJO_XML_PROJECT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Xojo projects can be saved in three different formats: Project (text), Binary, and XML. You must have a product license to create the XOJO_XML_PROJECT file. If you do not have a license, you will only be able to save in the binary format.

To create the XOJO_XML_PROJECT file, select File → New Project..., name the application, and click "OK." After you create the project, select File → Save As..., choose the save location, and click Save.
NOTE: REAL Software Real Studio became Xojo, Inc. Xojo in 2013.

description: Project created by Xojo, an IDE used to create desktop, web, and web-mobile applications; contains data in XML format that references contents of the application, such as windows, menus, controls, and build settings; can be built into an executable file.
